thiefworld.main

Class ThiefWorldWithUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.display.GUIState
      • thiefworld.main.ThiefWorldWithUI

  • public class ThiefWorldWithUI
extends sim.display.GUIState
    GUI implementation for the thief-world simulation.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea
